content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":261052,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（イベントＣＧ：カチューシャのエロ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Event CG: Katiusha's erotic scene)"},{"lineNumber":261053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回の作戦の裏事情","translatedEnglishLine":"The background story of this operation"},{"lineNumber":261054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ノートに関する説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation about the notes"},{"lineNumber":261055,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＤＸの会をランスがこの後、どう扱うか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"How Rance will handle the DX meeting from now on..."},{"lineNumber":261056,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド、司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Land, Headquarters"},{"lineNumber":261057,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍に動くがあった、３カ所からまとまって進撃してくる模様","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has made a move, apparently advancing in force from three locations"},{"lineNumber":261058,"originalJapaneseLine":"このＭランドには直接攻めてこずに周囲から落とす作戦のようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems they plan not to attack M-Land directly but to take it from the surroundings"},{"lineNumber":261059,"originalJapaneseLine":"　北部　ハンナ方面への進出、リーザスとの連絡が絶たれる","translatedEnglishLine":"North: Advancing toward Hanna, cutting off contact with Leesas"},{"lineNumber":261060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中部　Ｍランドの南を通ってポルトガル方面へ進出、ＪＡＰＡＮとの連絡が絶たれる","translatedEnglishLine":"Central: Advancing south past M-Land toward Portugal, severing links with JAPAN"},{"lineNumber":261061,"originalJapaneseLine":"　南部　パランチョ方面へ進出、ジフテリアが完全に孤立してしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"South: Advancing toward Palancho, leaving Diptheria completely isolated"},{"lineNumber":261062,"originalJapaneseLine":"全てを守るのは戦力的に難しい、押しきられる可能性がある","translatedEnglishLine":"Defending everything is militarily difficult; there is a possibility of being overwhelmed"},{"lineNumber":261063,"originalJapaneseLine":"各都市長を集めての会議","translatedEnglishLine":"A meeting gathering all city commanders"},{"lineNumber":261064,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビョンホウがどこか１カ所に絞って勝負をかけようと提案（伏線）","translatedEnglishLine":"Byonhou proposes to concentrate on one location to make a decisive move (foreshadowing)"},{"lineNumber":261065,"originalJapaneseLine":"全兵力をそこに集めて魔軍を一気に叩くのです、","translatedEnglishLine":"Gather all forces there and strike the demon army all at once."},{"lineNumber":261066,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらの得た情報で、魔物大将軍と魔人レイが同行する敵主力部隊は中部部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"According to our intelligence, the enemy main force accompanied by Demon General and Demon Lord Rei is the central unit."},{"lineNumber":261067,"originalJapaneseLine":"全軍、集めて一気に勝負をかける","translatedEnglishLine":"We will gather the entire army and make an all-out assault."},{"lineNumber":261068,"originalJapaneseLine":"これさえ倒せば後の軍は崩壊するはずです","translatedEnglishLine":"If we defeat this force, the rest of the enemy troops should collapse."},{"lineNumber":261069,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵が進撃してくるこの地で待ち構える、決戦の場はセキガハラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Awaiting the enemy's advance here; the decisive battlefield is Sekigahara."},{"lineNumber":261070,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスもめんどくさいからその案に賛成する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance agrees with the plan because it's easier that way."},{"lineNumber":261071,"originalJapaneseLine":"セキガハラの地","translatedEnglishLine":"The land of Sekigahara."},{"lineNumber":261072,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市方面に居る人類軍がほぼ全て集結した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Almost all of humanity's troops stationed near the Free Cities have gathered."},{"lineNumber":261073,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍が来るより先に布陣をした。","translatedEnglishLine":"They deployed their forces before the demon army arrived."},{"lineNumber":261074,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、魔軍が現れ布陣をする","translatedEnglishLine":"Afterwards, the demon army appeared and took their positions."},{"lineNumber":261075,"originalJapaneseLine":"数では負けているが圧倒的に有利な布陣","translatedEnglishLine":"They are outnumbered but have a commanding advantageous formation."},{"lineNumber":261076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類軍＝総数　魔軍＝人類軍＋５万ほど","translatedEnglishLine":"Human army = total; Demon army = human army plus about 50,000."},{"lineNumber":261077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マリアのチューリップ３号Ｈ型１２台も配備されている","translatedEnglishLine":"Twelve units of Maria's Tulip Type 3H are also deployed."},{"lineNumber":261078,"originalJapaneseLine":"図面を見て、軍師は言う、勝ったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at the maps, the strategist says, 'We've won.'"},{ "lineNumber":261079,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いは明日の朝から行われるだろう、最大の決戦になる","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle will probably start tomorrow morning; it will be the greatest showdown."},{"lineNumber":261080,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、夜のうちに動きがあるかもしれないので交代で休むようにとか","translatedEnglishLine":"However, since there might be movements during the night, they arrange shifts for rest."},{"lineNumber":261081,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに情報が入る","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, information comes in."},{"lineNumber":261082,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類側に内通者がいるかもという噂が飛び交う・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rumors spread that there may be a traitor among the humans..."},{"lineNumber":261083,"originalJapaneseLine":"仲間が信頼出来なくなっていく、コパンドンもいろいろ大変","translatedEnglishLine":"Trust among comrades diminishes; Copandon is also having a hard time."},{"lineNumber":261084,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャだけでは無いのか、うむむむ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it not only Katiusha? Hmmm..."},{"lineNumber":261085,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうする、誰かに合っておくと聞かれる","translatedEnglishLine":"What will you do? Someone asks if you will meet with anyone."},{"lineNumber":261086,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみなど忍者部隊の諜報では分からない、混乱させるように","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami and other ninja intelligence cannot find out; it seems meant to cause confusion."},{"lineNumber":261087,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍から全ての都市長に密偵が送られている","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has sent spies to all city commanders."},{"lineNumber":261088,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them."},{"lineNumber":261089,"originalJapaneseLine":"話す内容はキャラによって違います","translatedEnglishLine":"The content of the conversation varies depending on the character."},{"lineNumber":261090,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them."},{"lineNumber":261091,"originalJapaneseLine":"話す内容はキャラによって違います","translatedEnglishLine":"The content of the conversation varies depending on the character."},{"lineNumber":261092,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them."},{"lineNumber":261093,"originalJapaneseLine":"話す内容はキャラによって違います","translatedEnglishLine":"The content of the conversation varies depending on the character."},{"lineNumber":261094,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them."},{"lineNumber":261095,"originalJapaneseLine":"話す内容はキャラによって違います","translatedEnglishLine":"The content of the conversation varies depending on the character."},{"lineNumber":261096,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them."},{"lineNumber":261097,"originalJapaneseLine":"話す内容はキャラによって違います","translatedEnglishLine":"The content of the conversation varies depending on the character."},{"lineNumber":261098,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them."},{"lineNumber":261099,"originalJapaneseLine":"話す内容はキャラによって違います","translatedEnglishLine":"The content of the conversation varies depending on the character."},{"lineNumber":261100,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルの面談です","translatedEnglishLine":"It is a meeting with Cecil."},{"lineNumber":261101,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件により２パターンあります","translatedEnglishLine":"There are two patterns depending on the conditions."},{"lineNumber":261102,"originalJapaneseLine":"if (確認(\"セシルルート\")==1)\tセシルのエロを見ている／[２４０／５／セシル]発生済み","translatedEnglishLine":"if (check(\"CecilRoute\") == 1) You have seen Cecil's erotic scene / [240/5/Cecil] event completed"},{"lineNumber":261103,"originalJapaneseLine":"if (確認(\"セシルルート\")==0)\tセシルのエロを見ていない","translatedEnglishLine":"if (check(\"CecilRoute\") == 0) You have not seen Cecil's erotic scene"},{"lineNumber":261104,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261105,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロを見ている場合","translatedEnglishLine":"If you have seen the erotic scene"},{"lineNumber":261106,"originalJapaneseLine":"前回私が疑われていた時、ランス総統は信じてくれたはずだが、まだ疑っているのですか","translatedEnglishLine":"When I was suspected last time, Supreme Leader Rance was supposed to believe me, but are you still doubting?"},{"lineNumber":261107,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ・・あれから誘っても応じてくれない・・・ぶつぶつ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... Since then, even when I invite her, she won’t accept... grumble grumble"},{"lineNumber":261108,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時は、そのすまん・・ちょっとやさしさが足りなかった、なんかうれしくてつい調子に乗ったのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Back then, sorry... I wasn't gentle enough, I was just so happy that I got carried away."},{"lineNumber":261109,"originalJapaneseLine":"リベンジさせてくれ、今度はロマンチックに気持ちよくさせてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let me have my revenge; this time I'll make it romantic and pleasurable for you."},{"lineNumber":261110,"originalJapaneseLine":"けっこうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's fine."},{"lineNumber":261111,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、そんな事を言うと・・　君が魔軍と通じているぞーなんて決めちゃうぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, if you say that... I might decide that you are colluding with the demon army."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （イベントＣＧ：カチューシャのエロ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Event CG: Katiusha's erotic scene)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の作戦の裏事情
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The background story of this operation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ノートに関する説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation about the notes

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会をランスがこの後、どう扱うか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How Rance will handle the DX meeting from now on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に動くがあった、３カ所からまとまって進撃してくる模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has made a move, apparently advancing in force from three locations

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このＭランドには直接攻めてこずに周囲から落とす作戦のようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems they plan not to attack M-Land directly but to take it from the surroundings

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部　ハンナ方面への進出、リーザスとの連絡が絶たれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: North: Advancing toward Hanna, cutting off contact with Leesas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中部　Ｍランドの南を通ってポルトガル方面へ進出、ＪＡＰＡＮとの連絡が絶たれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Central: Advancing south past M-Land toward Portugal, severing links with JAPAN

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部　パランチョ方面へ進出、ジフテリアが完全に孤立してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: South: Advancing toward Palancho, leaving Diptheria completely isolated

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てを守るのは戦力的に難しい、押しきられる可能性がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defending everything is militarily difficult; there is a possibility of being overwhelmed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各都市長を集めての会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A meeting gathering all city commanders

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビョンホウがどこか１カ所に絞って勝負をかけようと提案（伏線）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Byonhou proposes to concentrate on one location to make a decisive move (foreshadowing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全兵力をそこに集めて魔軍を一気に叩くのです、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gather all forces there and strike the demon army all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの得た情報で、魔物大将軍と魔人レイが同行する敵主力部隊は中部部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to our intelligence, the enemy main force accompanied by Demon General and Demon Lord Rei is the central unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍、集めて一気に勝負をかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will gather the entire army and make an all-out assault.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これさえ倒せば後の軍は崩壊するはずです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we defeat this force, the rest of the enemy troops should collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵が進撃してくるこの地で待ち構える、決戦の場はセキガハラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Awaiting the enemy's advance here; the decisive battlefield is Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもめんどくさいからその案に賛成する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance agrees with the plan because it's easier that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セキガハラの地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The land of Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市方面に居る人類軍がほぼ全て集結した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost all of humanity's troops stationed near the Free Cities have gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が来るより先に布陣をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They deployed their forces before the demon army arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔軍が現れ布陣をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, the demon army appeared and took their positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数では負けているが圧倒的に有利な布陣
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are outnumbered but have a commanding advantageous formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍＝総数　魔軍＝人類軍＋５万ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human army = total; Demon army = human army plus about 50,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアのチューリップ３号Ｈ型１２台も配備されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Twelve units of Maria's Tulip Type 3H are also deployed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 図面を見て、軍師は言う、勝ったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the maps, the strategist says, 'We've won.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは明日の朝から行われるだろう、最大の決戦になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle will probably start tomorrow morning; it will be the greatest showdown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、夜のうちに動きがあるかもしれないので交代で休むようにとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, since there might be movements during the night, they arrange shifts for rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに情報が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, information comes in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側に内通者がいるかもという噂が飛び交う・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rumors spread that there may be a traitor among the humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間が信頼出来なくなっていく、コパンドンもいろいろ大変
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trust among comrades diminishes; Copandon is also having a hard time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャだけでは無いのか、うむむむ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it not only Katiusha? Hmmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする、誰かに合っておくと聞かれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do? Someone asks if you will meet with anyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみなど忍者部隊の諜報では分からない、混乱させるように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami and other ninja intelligence cannot find out; it seems meant to cause confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍から全ての都市長に密偵が送られている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has sent spies to all city commanders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの面談です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a meeting with Cecil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件により２パターンあります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two patterns depending on the conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("セシルルート")==1)	セシルのエロを見ている／[２４０／５／セシル]発生済み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("CecilRoute") == 1) You have seen Cecil's erotic scene / [240/5/Cecil] event completed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("セシルルート")==0)	セシルのエロを見ていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("CecilRoute") == 0) You have not seen Cecil's erotic scene

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロを見ている場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you have seen the erotic scene

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回私が疑われていた時、ランス総統は信じてくれたはずだが、まだ疑っているのですか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I was suspected last time, Supreme Leader Rance was supposed to believe me, but are you still doubting?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ・・あれから誘っても応じてくれない・・・ぶつぶつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... Since then, even when I invite her, she won’t accept... grumble grumble

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時は、そのすまん・・ちょっとやさしさが足りなかった、なんかうれしくてつい調子に乗ったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, sorry... I wasn't gentle enough, I was just so happy that I got carried away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リベンジさせてくれ、今度はロマンチックに気持ちよくさせてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me have my revenge; this time I'll make it romantic and pleasurable for you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そんな事を言うと・・　君が魔軍と通じているぞーなんて決めちゃうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, if you say that... I might decide that you are colluding with the demon army.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （イベントＣＧ：カチューシャのエロ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Event CG: Katiusha's erotic scene)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の作戦の裏事情
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The background story of this operation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ノートに関する説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation about the notes

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＤＸの会をランスがこの後、どう扱うか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How Rance will handle the DX meeting from now on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に動くがあった、３カ所からまとまって進撃してくる模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has made a move, apparently advancing in force from three locations

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このＭランドには直接攻めてこずに周囲から落とす作戦のようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems they plan not to attack M-Land directly but to take it from the surroundings

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部　ハンナ方面への進出、リーザスとの連絡が絶たれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: North: Advancing toward Hanna, cutting off contact with Leesas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中部　Ｍランドの南を通ってポルトガル方面へ進出、ＪＡＰＡＮとの連絡が絶たれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Central: Advancing south past M-Land toward Portugal, severing links with JAPAN

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部　パランチョ方面へ進出、ジフテリアが完全に孤立してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: South: Advancing toward Palancho, leaving Diptheria completely isolated

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てを守るのは戦力的に難しい、押しきられる可能性がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defending everything is militarily difficult; there is a possibility of being overwhelmed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各都市長を集めての会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A meeting gathering all city commanders

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビョンホウがどこか１カ所に絞って勝負をかけようと提案（伏線）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Byonhou proposes to concentrate on one location to make a decisive move (foreshadowing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全兵力をそこに集めて魔軍を一気に叩くのです、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gather all forces there and strike the demon army all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの得た情報で、魔物大将軍と魔人レイが同行する敵主力部隊は中部部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to our intelligence, the enemy main force accompanied by Demon General and Demon Lord Rei is the central unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍、集めて一気に勝負をかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will gather the entire army and make an all-out assault.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これさえ倒せば後の軍は崩壊するはずです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we defeat this force, the rest of the enemy troops should collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵が進撃してくるこの地で待ち構える、決戦の場はセキガハラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Awaiting the enemy's advance here; the decisive battlefield is Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもめんどくさいからその案に賛成する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance agrees with the plan because it's easier that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セキガハラの地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The land of Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市方面に居る人類軍がほぼ全て集結した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost all of humanity's troops stationed near the Free Cities have gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が来るより先に布陣をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They deployed their forces before the demon army arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔軍が現れ布陣をする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, the demon army appeared and took their positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数では負けているが圧倒的に有利な布陣
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are outnumbered but have a commanding advantageous formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍＝総数　魔軍＝人類軍＋５万ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human army = total; Demon army = human army plus about 50,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアのチューリップ３号Ｈ型１２台も配備されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Twelve units of Maria's Tulip Type 3H are also deployed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 図面を見て、軍師は言う、勝ったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the maps, the strategist says, 'We've won.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは明日の朝から行われるだろう、最大の決戦になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle will probably start tomorrow morning; it will be the greatest showdown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、夜のうちに動きがあるかもしれないので交代で休むようにとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, since there might be movements during the night, they arrange shifts for rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに情報が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, information comes in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側に内通者がいるかもという噂が飛び交う・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rumors spread that there may be a traitor among the humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間が信頼出来なくなっていく、コパンドンもいろいろ大変
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trust among comrades diminishes; Copandon is also having a hard time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャだけでは無いのか、うむむむ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it not only Katiusha? Hmmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする、誰かに合っておくと聞かれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do? Someone asks if you will meet with anyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみなど忍者部隊の諜報では分からない、混乱させるように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami and other ninja intelligence cannot find out; it seems meant to cause confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍から全ての都市長に密偵が送られている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has sent spies to all city commanders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと直接面談です。二人っきり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct meeting with Rance. Just the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話す内容はキャラによって違います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content of the conversation varies depending on the character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの面談です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a meeting with Cecil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件により２パターンあります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two patterns depending on the conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("セシルルート")==1)	セシルのエロを見ている／[２４０／５／セシル]発生済み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("CecilRoute") == 1) You have seen Cecil's erotic scene / [240/5/Cecil] event completed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("セシルルート")==0)	セシルのエロを見ていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("CecilRoute") == 0) You have not seen Cecil's erotic scene

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロを見ている場合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you have seen the erotic scene

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回私が疑われていた時、ランス総統は信じてくれたはずだが、まだ疑っているのですか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I was suspected last time, Supreme Leader Rance was supposed to believe me, but are you still doubting?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ・・あれから誘っても応じてくれない・・・ぶつぶつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... Since then, even when I invite her, she won’t accept... grumble grumble

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時は、そのすまん・・ちょっとやさしさが足りなかった、なんかうれしくてつい調子に乗ったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, sorry... I wasn't gentle enough, I was just so happy that I got carried away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リベンジさせてくれ、今度はロマンチックに気持ちよくさせてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me have my revenge; this time I'll make it romantic and pleasurable for you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そんな事を言うと・・　君が魔軍と通じているぞーなんて決めちゃうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, if you say that... I might decide that you are colluding with the demon army.
